name: Frog Full of Farts
description:
Fenwick the Frog enjoys nothing more than chowing down on flies from his Lilly Pad. Unfortunately, this summer the wasps are out in full force to mess with him, ruin his fun and take away points! Make Fenwick fart like a trooper by filling him with his favourite meal!

CREATED BY Joe Darcy (Triangle), Scott Baldwin (BlueBaldwin) and Rosie Campbell (exophagious)

Coding, animation and concept: Joe Darcy and Scott Baldwin

Artwork and music: Rosie Campbell

CONTROLS

Left click to attack.

Move mouse to aim tongue.
